mapper.select: SELECT seq, adressType, zipCode, search, address, addContact_seq, is_primary FROM naveradress WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT seq, adressType, zipCode, search, address, addContact_seq, is_primary FROM naveradress WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO naveradress ( adressType, zipCode, search, address, addContact_seq, is_primary ) values ( #{adressType}, #{zipCode}, #{search}, #{address}, #{addContact_seq}, #{is_primary} )
SELECT last_insert_id()
